DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics of single doses of the investigational AAB-001 Vaccine in Japanese patients with Alzheimer's disease.
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Single Ascending Doses of AAB-001 Vaccine SAD Japanese Patients With Alzheimers Disease
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of AD Age 5085 MMSE 1426 Other Inclusion Criteria Apply Significant Neurological Disease Major Psychiatric Disorder Clinically Significant Systemic Illness Other Exclusion Criteria Apply
